Reviews.Title: Save your money.
Reviews.Author: Leo S.
Reviews.Content: The filters and memory stick were fine, and the bag is usable, however the rest was pretty much junk. The other included lens were a joke as was the tripod. Save your money and buy the camera, which is wonderful, and get your filters elsewhere if you need them. After extensive use of this camera, I haven't found the filters particularly necessary. Definitely buy the camera though.

Reviews.Title: GOOD BUY FOR SOMEONE WANTING TO TAKE LOTS PIC,S
Reviews.Author: JIM
Reviews.Content: SAME AS BATTERIES AND CHARGER WORK GREAT AND TKES GOOD PHOTOS.  A GREAT KIT FOR THE NEW PERSON TKING PIC,S.JIM TULAROSA, NM

Reviews.Title: Great camera for me
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: The camera is nice , I feel fancy twisting the zoom. Down side is the lack of me being able to take quick unexspected snap shoots . Quality  is awesome for me. Bundle pack is rather cheap and hte camera bag barely holds the camera let alone all the stuff you see in the photo

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Adrienne Carey Frie
Reviews.Content: Everything was as exactly as described online and came at an unbeatable price. It even shipped quickly. Very highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Not what it seems!!!
Reviews.Author: fox4kids
Reviews.Content: The camera came with 2 additional lenses that cannot be used with the camera. It also was to come with a full size tripod but it did not come with one. Good camera though.

Reviews.Title: Muy buen producto
Reviews.Author: Diego Morocho Araujo
Reviews.Content: Realicé la compra y superó totalmente mis expectativas, estoy muy contento y satisfecho con la camara y todos sus accesorios.

Reviews.Title: Bad Bargain
Reviews.Author: oldskipro
Reviews.Content: This package contains two lenses that CANNOT be used with this camera. The Finepix HS 30 EXR is a FIXED lens camera and cannot accept any other lenses than  the one attached to the camera. This is not a "saver" as advertised

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but just another point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: compughter
Reviews.Content: This is a great  little camera. I say great because that's what it is. You can get the same quality from a smaller camera. I bought it thinking that bigger is better. In my opinion the smaller Fuji is just as good.
